messages.subject: Re:Spiral scouts
messages.msgSnippet: We had a local Spiral Scouts troop for a while and my girls loved it, but the energy fell off after 2 years because there weren t enough parent volunteers and
messages.messageBody:
We had a local Spiral Scouts troop for a while and my girls loved it,
but the energy fell off after 2 years because there weren't enough
parent volunteers and the lack of an established structure. I have
been thinking about just setting up a hearth (you can read about that
option on their website), but unfortunately that doesn't address the
need to be with other kids outside of our family.

Melissa

messages.subject: Spiral scouts
messages.msgSnippet: All this talk about GS and BS got me thinking...has anyone had experience with this? Around her GS is VERY Christian so we were looking into this option Faith
messages.messageBody:
